title: Bloomberg Markets: Veeva in Fight Over Tech Hiring Barriers
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Veeva in Fight Over Tech Hiring Barriers
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Peter P Gassner CEO/Co-Founder Veeva Systems Discussing the cloud computing firm challenging non-compete clauses in court.
